reference_summary:
10pcs Baby Girl Elastic Multicolor Flower Headband Rhinestone Hair Band Susenstone®610 {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Rhinestone', 'Fabric Type': 'elastic', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '0 - 5 months', 'UPC': '638823006215', 'Manufacturer': 'Susenstone®'} They're beautiful and look just like the picture! everything is solid on them! I can't wait to see our baby girl in them!! They're beautiful and look just like the picture MUSE & Co Dazzling Rhinestone Stick On Nails, White Nails with Glitter Nails and Rhinestones "French Sparkle", Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'White', 'Size': '36 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'French', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 4.33 x 0.79 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Not only are they beautiful but they stay!! I’ve been so nervous to try the new stick on nails trend but decided to go in and try these. I am so comfortable with them on! I’m not scared they’re going to pop of every 2 seconds. Especially with beauty shops being shut down on and off it’s an affordable and fun way to try out new stuff! I will say I used a UV lamp I already had after applying I’ll update when I try it without the UV lamp and as the days go by to see how they hold up. Obsessed!!!! Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Complete Nail Art Gel Kits for DIY Manicure, Pink Nude Series AIFAIFA {'Color': 'Pink', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.5 Pounds'} Neat little set. The only thing I didn’t like about it was that the nail polish bottles weren’t labeled. Kind of messed me up at first thinking the bottom coat was the top but once I figured it out I taped the caps up so I can tell.
EDIT*** they ARE labeled!!! I’m just blind!! Neat little set MUSE & Co Dazzling Swarovski Stick On Nails, Light Pink Nails Embellished with Swarovski Crystals "Elegant Princess" Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set, 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'Nude', 'Size': '36 Piece Set (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.79 x 4.33 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Got my first pair and had to get more! They’re beautiful and stick great!!!! Beautiful AOFLLU Hair Clips for Girls, 120 Pcs No Slip Metal Snap Hair Clips Barrettes for Girls Kids Women AOFLLU {'Brand': 'AOFLLU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Occasion': "Christmas, Valentine's Day", 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.9 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} My daughter has very short hair and they don’t all fit up into her ponytail so we use these types of clips to pin up her fly aways. They have a strong hold and don’t fall out as easy as other brands we’ve tried! Plus the variety of colors is great so they can match her outfits. They were all accounted for as well! Highly recommend! Strong hold Pumice Stone for Feet, 2 in 1 Double Sided Hard Skin Callus Remover for Feet,Hands and Body, Exfoliator Pedicure File Block Callus Remover Scrubber (Pack of 4) KSang {'Brand': 'KSang', 'Material': 'Volcanic Stone', 'Is Electric': 'No', 'Item Form': 'Scrubber, Filer', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 5.6 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242957393'} These work great. Since stay at home order I’ve invested in doing my own pedis and these are a must! They get the job done and the colors are a cute touch! Works great Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series) MIZHSE {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'} I have their blue set so when I saw the links I knew I needed them and they do not disappoint! Easy application! You will need a Uv light to help cure and a base and top coat. It also came with a bonus glitter pot as a gift! Love this brand SOFTACULOUS Foot Peeling Mask Booties – 2 Pairs, Baby Soft Skin in 7 Days SuiteMade {'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 5.91 x 1.14 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'STM-FMP-LAV', 'UPC': '734038263785'} I was pretty skeptical when I saw that this was a foot peel I thought maybe I would just moisturize my feet at the most. Well I was in for a surprise because after three days my feet started peeling and my feet feel amazing. I am a total firm believer in this mask and I will totally recommend it Started peeling after three days Color Changing Gel Nail Polish Set Spring Summer Mood Nail Polish for Starter and Professional 6 Colors Pink Red Blue Yellow Purple Brown Manicure Kit for Valentine’s Day Girlfriend Gift ASKITO {'Brand': 'ASKITO', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting,Long-lasting', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.62 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces'} These gel polishes work really nicely. They play great and the color changing is so cool I’ve never seen anything like it and it’s a cool set to have in my collection. I’ve had many compliments. Cute 3 Barrel Curling Iron, Milantia 3/4 Inch Mini Travel Curling Wand Hair for Small Curly, Dual Voltage Ceramic Tourmaline 19mm Crimper Hair Iron for Women - Fast Heating, Portable Milantia {'Shape': 'Barrel', 'Brand': 'Milantia', 'Hair Type': 'All,Thick,Thin', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Product Dimensions': '9.25 x 1.97 x 1.97 inches; 12.63 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Milantia'} This works amazing on my hair heat it up fast and easy to work with. Also because it’s a smaller size it’s great to travel with. New favorite hair tool Works great uxosuz Beard Apron for Men Beard Catcher for Shaving Beard Apron Trimming Apron with 2pcs Suction Cups+ 1pc Brush uxosuz {'UPC': '721996979933'} This is super light weight and caught all of my husbands beard hairs. I was so sick of cleaning the sink because he wouldn’t clean it to my liking so this has saved me and him lol! Works great Microfiber Hair Towels - 5 Towel Set – 5 Beautiful Colors - Great for all Hair Types - Size (10 x 26 inches) Lightweight, Absorbent, and Ultra Soft. Colors Rose, Pink, Gray, Blue, and Lilac. AViBNiUM {'Brand': 'AViBNiUM', 'Towel form type': 'Hair Towel', 'Age Range (Description)': 'All Ages', 'Material': 'Microfiber', 'Product Dimensions': '26"L x 10"W', 'Package Dimensions': '13 x 10 x 3 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '860005528004'} Super convenient and they work amazing I love the color options and they could work in a goodie bag for a girls trip! Super fun idea and they dry well too! They have a loop to wrap around a button so it keeps in place! Nice Licoville Halo Hair Extensions Human Hair Balayage Ash Brown to Ash Brown with Bleach Blonde Highlights Remy Hair Halo Extensions for Women 14 Inch 70g Straight One Piece Halo Hair Flip in Licoville {'Brand': 'Licoville', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Halo', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 4.02 x 1.85 inches; 5.93 Ounces'} I love this hair piece! It isn’t too heavy and gives me a fuller look to my hair! The match couldn’t be any better and I wear it all of the time!! So easy to put on!! Love!! Especially considering the weight we put on them! Perfect
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Target Audience:** The user continues to focus on stylish and functional products for babies, particularly girls, enhancing overall aesthetic appeal while promoting organization.

- **Product Type:** The user’s interest has broadened to include storage solutions for grooming tools and hair accessories, indicating a desire for both practicality and style. Their latest purchase emphasizes a commitment to aesthetic organization in their child's space.

- **Occasions:** The user remains engaged in seeking fashionable offerings for special events like weddings and birthdays, keen on crafting memorable experiences for their child while expressing personal style.

- **Aesthetic Preferences:** They value colorful and decorative items, reflected in their enthusiasm for vibrant hair accessories and organization tools, which underline a lively, aesthetically pleasing lifestyle.

- **Quality Expectations:** The user upholds high standards for product durability and functionality, favoring items that align with their wellness values, such as being non-toxic and cruelty-free.

- **Emotional Connection:** The user finds joy in integrating baby products with personal grooming tools and accessories, viewing both as essential to style and self-care. They emphasize family connections while acknowledging the importance of organization in personal grooming.

Overall, the user actively explores stylish beauty accessories and practical organization solutions, reflecting a delightful and aesthetically conscious lifestyle that centers on high-quality products for themselves and their child. Their latest interaction illustrates a growing interest in organizing hair accessories while enhancing personal aesthetics.
